ruling: - If you target the opponent's monster with the effect of [[B.E.S. Crystal Core]], and an effect is chained that causes it to no longer be on your opponent's side of the field (such as [[Remove Brainwashing]] or [[Enemy Controller]]), the effect of [[B.E.S. Crystal Core]] is not applied.
- The effect of [[B.E.S. Crystal Core]] that destroys itself during the damage step cannot be chained to.
